design.from sentence: To tackle the above mentioned problems , we design a new framework based on sequence to - sequence oriented encoder - decoder model equipped with a latent structure modeling component .

employ.from sentence: We employ Variational Auto - Encoders ( VAEs ) as the base model for our generative framework which can handle the inference problem associated with complex generative modeling .

propose.from sentence: Inspired by , we add historical dependencies on the latent variables of VAEs and propose a deep recurrent generative decoder ( DRGD ) for latent structure modeling .

integrated.from sentence: Then the standard discriminative deterministic decoder and the recurrent generative decoder are integrated into a unified decoding framework .

decoded.from sentence: The target summaries will be decoded based on both the discriminative deterministic variables and the generative latent structural information .
